channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Mart Jürisoo
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Mart Jürisoo

item.title: International Football Results Database
item.description: This is a database of every international football result ever. Or quite close to that. I created it before the 2016 World Cup when I couldn't find a simply formatted results database. Most of the results were scraped from two websites that don't exist anymore. Technically, obviously, all the results are out there. Just not in a neat file. But now they are. And they're updated monthly. It is one of the most popular datasets on Kaggle.
